toolSpec.name: query_generation
toolSpec.description: Use this tool to generate the query to resolve the user's question. Use this tool before running a query

toolSpec.name: validate_and_run_queries
toolSpec.description: Use this tool to execute the SQL queries, will be generated by a 'query_generation' tool. Only one statement can be executed at a time, so if multiple queries need to be executed, use this tool repeatedly

generated_query.description: The SQL query to execute. It should be formatted as "SELECT ...;"

toolSpec.name: schema_exploration
toolSpec.description: Use this tool only if the 'validation_and_run_queries' tool fails with errors such as 'no such table' or 'no such column.' This tool can access the DB metastore to search for the desired information.

keyword.description: (English) Some text to search for the desired information.
